631.question: Why did they think this was a good idea?

1-Table1-1.png: The table in the image is an example of a TCM (Traditional Chinese Medicine) symptom-prescription pair. The idea behind this system is that certain herbs and medications can be used to alleviate or treat specific symptoms. By matching symptoms with appropriate prescriptions, TCM practitioners aim to restore balance and harmony within the body. This approach has been practiced for centuries and is still widely used in traditional medicine practices around the world.

631.answer: They think it will help human TCM practitioners make prescriptions.
